title: cmd/compile: trace of escape analysis doesn't have correct position
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

#### What did you do?
If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error.
A complete runnable program is good.
A link on play.golang.org is best.
```go
package main

func main() {
	b := []byte("test")

	escape(b)
}

func escape(b []byte) {
	panic(b)
}

```
$ go build -gcflags "-m=2 -l" p.go

#### What did you expect to see?
./p.go:4: 	from b (passed to function[unknown]) at ./p.go:6

#### What did you see instead?
./p.go:4: 	from b (passed to function[unknown]) at ./p.go:4

#### Does this issue reproduce with the latest release (go1.7.1)?
